name: Revolving
description:
Can you finish all 50 levels? TAP your way through the levels!

#Revolving is the game that will keep you focused, and craving for more :)

This is your next addiction!
So how far can you go into the matrix? #revolving

Features:

• Amazing One-Touch puzzle
• Minimalistic and awesome game design
• Pleasent Soundtrack
• Beat Friends, Family, and Team Mates in Game Center Leaderboard!

How to Play:

Tap anywhere on the screen to begin your progress through the percolating objects.

This game requires focus, skills, and perfect timing to get through the obstacles!

Think you have what it takes?
